name: Friday Night Funkin - TheGamingParrot Crew Mod
name_original: Friday Night Funkin - TheGamingParrot Crew Mod
description:
This uses FNF Modding Plus. Pico has been replaced with TheGamingParrot, a small youtube channel. Music Provided by premiumbeat.com

Can you beat TheGamingParrot and his loyal sidekick Birdo? Including a all new song in normal mode. Can you beat it?

Daddy Dearest = WaspSpit_Go

Spooky Kids = DokiLuke and Streoiko.

Pico = TheGamingParrot + Birdo
